content:
important update to use .net 10 preview since latest version of .net 9 isn't supporting wasi runtime identifier any more. See other updates in the release notes: https://github.com/bytecodealliance/componentize-dotnet/releases/tag/v0.7.0-preview00010

Release v0.7.0-preview00010 · bytecodealliance/componentize-dotnet
# https://www.nuget.org/packages/BytecodeAlliance.Componentize.DotNet.Templates dotnet new install BytecodeAlliance.Componentize.DotNet.Templates # https://www.nuget.org/packages/BytecodeAlliance....
